postBootScript: yum install -y python-devel gcc; pip install psutil; pip install Kafka-python; git clone https://github.com/RENCI-NRIG/host-key-tools.git /root/host-key-tools; cd /root/host-key-tools/hostkey-py/; python setup.py install; cp /root/host-key-tools/host-key-tools.service /usr/lib/systemd/system; sed -i 's/ExecStart=.*/ExecStart=\/usr\/bin\/hostkeyd start -c https:\/\/comet-hn1.exogeni.net:8111\/ -s WORKFLOW -r WORKFLOWread -w WORKFLOWwrite/g' /usr/lib/systemd/system/host-key-tools.service; systemctl enable host-key-tools.service ; service host-key-tools.service start;git clone https://github.com/RENCI-NRIG/Mobius-scripts.git /root/Mobius-scripts; cp /root/Mobius-scripts/scripts/master_submit.sh /root/master_submit.sh;sed -i 's/NETWORK_INTERFACE=/NETWORK_INTERFACE=REPLACEIP/g' /root/master_submit.sh;echo 'net.ipv4.ip_forward=1' >> /etc/sysctl.conf; sysctl -p;sh /root/master_submit.sh
